website_summaries.verdict: Attain clear, HD quality images, even at night.
pros: This device can rotate nearly 360-degrees, surveying every nook and cranny of its environment
Smaller than other products and notably good for watching over pets while away
One of the better night vision monitoring devices available
cons: Not entirely WiFi compatible, and may require a LAN connection

customer_reviews.title: Awesome video quality, clear audio.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitate to purchase a 1080P WiFi camera that cost less than $40. But I am surprised by how clear the video & audio is, The audio is very clear, no freeze, it's much better than my previous camera from another brand. I subscribed the cloud service, it does not cost much, but it does a great job, motion detection with video clips, saving the videos in th e last 7 days to the cloud, NO SD card needed, and it's safe, isn't it? Got 2 of them, will difinitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: jjjasmine

customer_reviews.title: Cool home camera, easy & quick connection, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a camera for several days, because I have a baby, I want to know what she is doing when I'm out. Now I got one! This camera is really cool, and it's easy & quick to connect the camera to my phone, the video is clear & smooth, I can always keep an eye on my baby now! This is definitely what I'm looking for! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: After countless attempts trying to get the camera to connect to my network and smartphone, I finally had to throw in the towel after endless frustration. The smartphone app lacks basic functionality, the instructions that came with the camera were no help at all, and I could never tell for sure whether the camera was working or not (no indicator light; sometimes the device reset, and other times it didn't; and it would seem to be booting up and then go silent). I had the correct network speed 2.4GB, a new Android phone, and a functioning home network. What I didn't have was more time to waste, so buyers beware. I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: I give up on this
customer_reviews.text: The device would connect to the router but would not connect to a WiFi Extender that other devices could connect to. Because I finally found a use for the camera that required the Extender and a lot of time passed AND IT FAILED, I threw this camera away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with over all quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality of image is very crisp and clearer. Camera moves with swipe of fingertip on my phone screen. Sound quality is decent and you can speak through the camera while you are away.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Good product?
customer_reviews.text: Burglarized May 5th. Ordered this camera. Friend was to come & help book up. Burglar too it when he came back a couple weeks later. Ordering a 2nd one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Candy Swank

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one love it so much I bought two more trying to debate on where to put another. Just wish I didn't have to pay for the cloud or that it would record onto my SD cards I'm sure I'm probably just using it wrong though
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Poor support
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste time and money buying this security camera. Extremely poor after sales support.
customer_reviews.author: KJ824

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: It connected for about one month then stopped working. I have spent hours trying to reset this device. Not worth my time or energy! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: very perfect pet camera,1080h i dont need stay my home take care my pet ,and when thief come my house ,i will call 911 on time ,thx
customer_reviews.author: joxin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like the design which is very cute. And it's easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t keep connection and it sits directly next to my router and constantly talks to you. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amie S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up. I was up and running after 6 minutes of serring up. The microphone works. You can move the camera angle with your phone. Images and video quality are crisp and clear. The night vision works better than expected. I have attatched a photo of the night vision quality, this is with all lights out and very dark.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a full-time teacher, and my father is at home by himself while I'm at work. He uses a walker due to a stroke a couple of years ago, so I bought this Smart IP camera for him last week. It's small and mobile with a cute look, easy to set up, and easy to use. You can also tap the screen on your phone to move the camera around to catch more things. When I'm at work, I can easily check on him on my phone, which eases up my worries about him. You can also talk to each other via the speaker. It's just so wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jiatao Lu

customer_reviews.title: He does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I like my little Stormtrooper. People don't seem to notice it which is good. I also like that there's no light on when you're watching.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera kept going offline and we would constantly have to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool product for such a reasonable price. Buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: Berry Brustolin
